message.content: {"id": "27869", "title": "Bug 27869 - StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData", "description": "Bug 27869 - The StyledText widget in the Red Hat 8 operating system is overusing the Font.getFontData API. Additionally, the StyledText widget is heavily utilizing the FontMetrics API. It is suggested that the metric information should be cached in the StyledText widget and updated only when the font is changed.", "OB": "The current implementation of the StyledText widget in Red Hat 8 excessively employs the Font.getFontData API and heavily relies on the FontMetrics API.", "EB": "It is believed, and many people agree, that the StyledText widget should not utilize the Font.getFontData API when text is being typed.", "SR": "To optimize the performance of the StyledText widget, the metric information should be cached within the widget and updated only when necessary, specifically when the font is changed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '27869', 'title': 'Bug 27869StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData', 'description': 'Bug 27869StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData Btw, UTF8is the default english encoding for Redhat 8.FontMetrics API is also very used by the StyledText, I believe that the metricinformation should be cached in the StyledText and update only when the font ischanged. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "I believe, and many people agree,that this API don't need to be used at all by the StyledText when it's beentyped. ", 'SR': ''}
